steps.title: Welcome to ARLAS Exploration
steps.content:
Explore your data instantly through

- Geo-analytic view on the map (Heatmaps, Grids, ...)
- Timeline
- Different widgets (histograms, donuts, powernbars) to analyse diffent dimensions of the data.

steps.title: Global count
steps.content: It indicates how many elements are explored.

steps.title: Search box
steps.content: Here you can search anything to filter the data.

steps.title: Analytics and Filters
steps.content:
This board gives you a global view of your data thanks to the different analytics.
You can interact with them directly to filter the data.

steps.title: Timeline filter
steps.content: This histogram represents the distibution of number of elements over time. You can filter your data by selecting one or several periods: double click on one period to save it, then move the selection brush to define a new interval.

steps.title: Time shortcuts
steps.content: A list of time shortcuts to filter data on a specific time range.

steps.title: Maps settings
steps.content: ACTION : Click on the Map settings button

steps.title: Apply change
steps.content:
- Choose how to query geographically the elements (Geo-queries tab).

ACTION : Click to apply changes

steps.title: Filters and drawing tools
steps.content: You can draw or remove a bbox/polygon or import it as KML, Geojson or Zipped Shapefile to filter data.

steps.title: Layers legend
steps.content:
Layers are placed in different Visualisation sets that you can hide/display separately.

You can reorder Visualisation sets and the layers within by dragging and dropping them.

Each layer has its own legend that you can fold/unfold
